description
Feel like Ken from Street Fighter IV with this alternate gi bottom. Combine it with the matching top and become the ultimate martial artist! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Ken de Street Fighter IV avec ce haut de kimono alternatif. Combinez-le avec le bas et devenez le combattant ultime ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen unteren Teil eines Gis wie Ken aus Street Fighter IV! Kombiniere es mit dem passenden Oberteil und werde zum ultimativen Martial-Arts-Kämpfer! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Ken di Street Fighter IV con la parte sotto del kimono. Combinalo con il sopra per essere il lottatore di arti marziali definitivo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este quimono alternativo y siéntete como Ken de Street Fighter IV! ¡Combínalo con la parte superior y siente el poder del shotokan! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ケンになりきることができる道着 （下）のアレンジ ver.！ 上下あわせてあなたも格闘家気分！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 켄이 되는 도복(하의). 어렌지 ver.！ 상, 하의를 맞추면 당신도 격투가! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Ken from Street Fighter IV with this alternate gi bottom. Combine it with the matching top and become the ultimate martial artist! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
